metadata.title: CVE-2018-6359 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The decompileIF function (util/decompile.c) in libming through 0.4.8 isvulnerable to a use-after-free, which may allow attackers to cause a denialof service or unspecified other impact via a crafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
